title: Howling Blog
subtitle: Next.js and MongoDB
description:
A personal blog written from scratch using Next.js and MongoDB for the database. Talks about things I do on programming and sometimes my hobbies.
You may find something interesting from the perspective of a college student inside...

title: Wangy Generator
subtitle: Golang, Svelte, and MongoDb
description:
Probably the very thing that can depict how wild internet could be.
Inside lies various templates of copypasta, whether it's normal, weird, or outright cursed. Comes with fields to fill out your wildest imaginations and also editor to add new templates easily

title: Arknights Data Explorer
subtitle: React, TailwindCSS, PostgreSQL, Express.js
description: A side project to create a data explorer on the game Arknights.
